summary: A musical romantic comedy set at a mall and focused on the relationship between two young musicians and their respective personal and professional struggles.
cast: Nina Dobrev|Rob Mayes|Autumn Reeser|Yassmin Alers|Al Sapienza|Brooke Lyons|Bresha Webb|Bianca Collins|Blythe Auffarth|Rodney To|Neil Haskell|David Baum|Wade Allain-Marcus|Josh Rouah|Nikola Clark|Kira Plastinina|Bayli Baker|Kelli Baker|Shawn Carter|Katie Cockrell|Kellie Cockrell|Christian Denice|Matthew Dorame|Mollee Gray|Tadd Gadduang|Shannon Hendrix|Thayne Jasperson|Eldon Johnson|Roger Malaga|Gevorg Manoukian|Nina Miller|Emily Seegmiller|Veronica Yeager|Gabriel Borden|Chance Borden|Nacole Brown|Mike Christensen|Stacy Clark|Averie DelGrosso|Molly DePolla|Kaleb Henderson|Kameron Henderson|Adair Hensley|Bailee Hunsaker|Nathan Kukahiko|Melissa Magleby|Chris Pitts|Nick Pitts|Kaitlyn Schwab|Erin Sullivan|Megan Sullivan|Jessie Thacker|Josh Unice|Oscar Figueroa|Julia Faye West|Harry Shum Jr.|Johnny Ahn|Jamey Anthony|Madison Dominguez Aragon|Elle Devine|Chanelle DeVore|Kyle Esposito|Lindsey Evans|Larry Filion|Oksana Georgiu|Jeremiah Ginn|Lafe Jordan|Angella Joy|Tony Knight|Mary Alice Nelson|Priscilla Poland|Chase Ramsey|Yun
title: The American Mall
